data.title: American Idol
data.meta_description: Get the latest american idol news, articles, videos and photos on the New York Post.
data.text:
Katy Perry quits 'American Idol' after 7 seasons: 'I need to feel that pulse of my own beat'

After Jimmy Kimmel asked the singer how long she plans to remain as a judge on the hit ABC show, Perry revealed that the upcoming 22nd season will be her...

Luke Bryan worried he'd be fired from 'American Idol' over controversial Dustin Lynch rant

Bryan came under fire last year when he roasted Lynch's drinking and STD tests onstage at the Crash My Playa music festival in Mexico.

We've got everything you need to about Benson Boone's 2024 tour

The rising star is dropping into New York and New Jersey this spring.

Viral 'American Idol' alum William Hung's marriage ended over gambling addiction: I was 'greedy'

William Hung stunned the "American Idol" judges back in 2004 for his off-key rendition of the Ricky Martin tune "She Bang."

Nigel Lythgoe steps down from 'So You Think You Can Dance' after Paula Abdul sexual assault claims

The former "American Idol" and "SYTYCD" producer has denied the "Straight Up" singer's claims.

Kelly Clarkson reveals how she 'dropped weight' after insane body transformation

The "American Idol" Season 1 winner revealed in People's new cover story that relocating to New York City helped with her wellness routine.

Nigel Lythgoe sued for sexual assault, battery by two more women following Paula Abdul's complaint

The women allege that Lythgoe "walked around the set and dressing rooms and openly swatted and groped [their] and other contestants' buttocks."

Kelly Clarkson's then-hubby told her she wasn't 'sexy' enough like Rihanna to be on 'The Voice': singer

Clarkson's now-ex and former manager, Brandon Blackstock, 47, was ordered to pay her $2.6 million for unlawfully procuring deals that should have been handled by her talent agents.

Fantasia Barrino reveals why she 'hated' starring in 'The Color Purple' on Broadway

“That was around the time that my life was so crazy," Barrino, 39, told People.

Nigel Lythgoe denies Paula Abdul's 'deeply offensive' sexual assault claims: 'I will fight this'

"While Paula’s history of erratic behavior is well known, I can’t pretend to understand exactly why she would file a lawsuit that she must know is untrue," he said.

‘American Idol’ producer accused of sexually assaulting Paula Abdul joked he wanted to be 'next to abuse her' in resurfaced interview

Abdul co-hosted the show with Cowell from 2002 to 2009 and the two often bickered in front of the cameras. Lythgoe was also a producer on "Idol."

Paula Abdul sues 'American Idol' executive Nigel Lythgoe for alleged sexual assault

“Lythgoe knew and was aware that his treatment of Abdul was inappropriate and even criminal,” the suit states.

Country singer Gabby Barrett claps back at haters: I was told I'm 'ruining' my career over marriage comments

"I treasure my marriage and my relationship with the Lord the most." — Gabby Barrett

Country singer turns down 'intimate' duets with men so she won’t 'jeopardize' marriage

"If I’m singing with another man, is that going to make my husband uncomfortable? Probably." — Gabby Barrett

Fantasia Barrino accuses Airbnb host of 'racial profiling' during family trip: 'I can't stay quiet'

"My stomach is so uneasy this morning as I’m riding back to my home in the cold and rain." — Fantasia Barrino

Kelly Clarkson ran off stage mid-concert after her breast was 'showing'

Country singer Kelly Clarkson had to "Breakaway" from the audience Monday after she became worried that her sheer outfit was revealing more than she was willing to show.
